definition: having sections or patches colored differently and usually brightly, coarse cloth with a bright print
details:
adjective
- having sections or patches colored differently and usually brightly
= example: having sections or patches colored differently and usually brightly
= synonyms: multi-colored
- made of calico or resembling calico in being patterned
= example: made of calico or resembling calico in being patterned
noun
- coarse cloth with a bright print
